title: Trojans spyware SMS blockers spam
extract: A Trojan horse or Trojan is a type of malware that is often disguised as legitimate software. ... Once activated, Trojans can enable cyber-criminals to spy on you, steal your sensitive data, and gain backdoor access to your system. These actions can include: Deleting data. Blocking data.
extract_html: A Trojan horse or Trojan is a type of malware that is often disguised as legitimate software. ... Once activated, Trojans can enable cyber-criminals to spy on you, steal your sensitive data, and gain backdoor access to your system. These actions can include: Deleting data. Blocking data.
